How do I get the BitPay crypto debit car: How do I get the BitPay crypto debit card?
We are currently pausing all new applica: We are currently pausing all new applications for the BitPay Card as we revamp the program. The BitPay Card will only be available to U.S. residents. Join the waitlist to be notified once more information is available.
How can I spend crypto without the BitPa: How can I spend crypto without the BitPay Card?
The BitPay Card is only one of the ways: The BitPay Card is only one of the ways we help you live on crypto. More ways to spend and cash out crypto with BitPay include:
directly from your wallet with BitPay me: directly from your wallet with BitPay merchants. View a curated list of merchants who accept crypto in the
for the most popular brands and retailer: for the most popular brands and retailers.
into a stablecoin like USDC using the Bi: into a stablecoin like USDC using the BitPay app.
The BitPay Card works like any other deb: The BitPay Card works like any other debit card. But, instead of using funds from a bank account, you can add funds from the
or your Coinbase account. After funding: or your Coinbase account. After funding your card, you are ready to use it practically anywhere. Use the BitPay crypto debit card in-store or online. Need cash instead? Use it at any compatible ATM. Add funds, freeze your card, and track transactions all from the BitPay app.
Where can I use the BitPay Card?: Where can I use the BitPay Card?
U.S. residents may use the BitPay Card o: U.S. residents may use the BitPay Card online or in-store wherever major debit cards are accepted. It can also be used as an ATM card to instantly convert your Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies into dollars. Use it to travel, entertain, buy gift cards, invest, treat yourself, and live on crypto!
What coins does the BitPay Card support?: What coins does the BitPay Card support?
BitPay supports Bitcoin, major alt coins: BitPay supports Bitcoin, major alt coins, tokens, and stablecoins. We are constantly evaluating and adding new coins. Currently we support:
Is the BitPay Card a credit card or debi: Is the BitPay Card a credit card or debit card?
The BitPay card is not a crypto credit c: The BitPay card is not a crypto credit card. The BitPay card is a prepaid debit card which customers can fund via their preferred wallet within the BitPay app. The BitPay Card is available as a virtual crypto card and physical card.
How do I add funds or reload the card?: How do I add funds or reload the card?
Funds can be added to the BitPay Card th: Funds can be added to the BitPay Card through the BitPay app or BitPay website. The BitPay Card can be loaded with crypto from the BitPay Wallet or your Coinbase account.
to learn more about the process.
How do I earn cash back?: How do I earn cash back?
Earning cash back Powered by Dosh is aut: Earning cash back Powered by Dosh is automatic and easy. All you have to do is use the BitPay Card at participating merchants. You can see all the current offers curated for you at any time in the rewards section of the BitPay app.
Where can I earn cash back?: Where can I earn cash back?
There are more than 100,000 places to ge: There are more than 100,000 places to get cash back when you use the BitPay Card. You can use the BitPay app to find places near you and online offering crypto rewards.
How much cash back do I earn for using t: How much cash back do I earn for using the BitPay Card?
Each merchant is different, and the perc: Each merchant is different, and the percentage you earn will be shown next to the offer and in the offer details.

Websites and exchanges get hacked. BitPa: Websites and exchanges get hacked. BitPay's self - custody wallet allows you to privately store, manage and use your crypto funds without a centralized bank or exchange.

. Using my 12-word phrase is the only wa: 如果此应用被删除或设备丢失，使用我的 12 字短语是找回资金的唯一方式。

By selecting \"Other\" as your payment m: By selecting "Other" as your payment method, you will have access to all payment methods enabled by the exchanges based on your country of residence and your selected fiat currency.
For debit/credit card or Apple Pay payme: For debit/credit card or Apple Pay payments, fees are 1.99% of the transaction.
Most bank transfers do not charge a fee. But there may be exceptions for particular cases.
For payments through PIX 3.00% of the tr: For payments through PIX 3.00% of the transaction.
Banxa also charges a service fee, which: Banxa also charges a service fee, which is included in the unit price for the transaction, based the cost of each payment method.
This service is provided by a third part: 此服务由第三方提供，您需要遵守其
For card payments 4.5% of the transactio: For card payments 4.5% of the transaction with a minimum of €3.99/£3.99/$3.99 or currency equivalent.
For bank transfers 1% of the transaction: For bank transfers 1% of the transaction with a minimum of €3.99/£3.99/$3.99 or currency equivalent
For payments through PIX 2.95% of the tr: For payments through PIX 2.95% of the transaction.
Moonpay also charges a dynamic network f: Moonpay also charges a dynamic network fee on all BTC, ETH and ERC20 tokens purchases, based on the blockchain network conditions.
For card payments 3.9% of the transactio: For card payments 3.9% of the transaction with a minimum of €2.49 or currency equivalent.
For bank transfers from 1.49% to 2.99% o: For bank transfers from 1.49% to 2.99% of the transaction with a minimum of €2.49 or currency equivalent, depending on the amount and the selected transfer method
Ramp also charges a dynamic network fee: Ramp also charges a dynamic network fee based on the blockchain network conditions, and a partner margin when purchasing crypto within their apps.
SardineTermsFeeInfo: Sardine charges both a network fee ({{networkFee}}% of this transaction) based on the blockchain network conditions, and a processing fee ({{transactionFee}}% of this transaction).
The network fee is paid to crypto miners: The network fee is paid to crypto miners to ensure that the transaction is processed on the crypto network.
Can range from 3.5% to 5% of the transac: 根据交易量，可以为交易额的 3.5% 到 5%（最低 10 美元或任何其他法币的等值金额）+ 交易额的 1%。

linkedWalletWarnMsg: Keep in mind that once the funds are received in your {{selectedWallet}} wallet, to move them you will need to have enough funds in your {{chain}} linked wallet {{linkedWalletName}} to pay the {{chainCoin}} miner fees.

Payment request made. You must complete: Payment request made. You must complete the purchase process with our partner Banxa.
Payment request made. If you have succes: Payment request made. If you have successfully completed the entire payment process, remember that receiving crypto may take a few hours.
The order has been created. Banxa is wai: The order has been created. Banxa is waiting for customer to make payment for the order.
The customer has made payment, waiting f: The customer has made payment, waiting for final payment confirmation from any external payment systems.
The customer has made payment and it has: The customer has made payment and it has been confirmed.
Order is being verified and processed.
The cryptocurrency transaction has been: The cryptocurrency transaction has been submitted to the blockchain.
Thr order has been cancelled by the cust: Thr order has been cancelled by the customer during the payment process.
The order has been declined by external: The order has been declined by external payment systems.
The order has been created, but the cust: The order has been created, but the customer has not made payment for the order within the expiry time.
The order has failed at some point in th: The order has failed at some point in the process.
The order has been completed. Banxa deem: The order has been completed. Banxa deems the cryptocurrency transaction to be completed after 2 confirmations on blockchain.
The order has been refunded in response: The order has been refunded in response to a request from a customer.
Payment request made. You must complete: Payment request made. You must complete the purchase process with our partner Moonpay.
Transaction is waiting for an incoming p: 交易正在等待传入付款。
Moonpay is purchasing your crypto. This: Moonpay is purchasing your crypto. This takes between a few minutes and a few hours. Thanks for your patience.
The order has been received and authoriz: The order has been received and authorization is pending.
Coins were successfully sent to the reci: 加密货币已成功发送到接收人地址。
Transaction has failed. In most cases, i: Transaction has failed. In most cases, it's because you haven't properly verified your identity or payment method or you've reached your maximum daily/weekly purchase limit.
Payment request made. You must complete: Payment request made. You must complete the purchase process with our partner Ramp.
Payment request made. You must complete the purchase process with our partner Sardine.
There is an open or ongoing order. If yo: There is an open or ongoing order. If you have successfully completed the entire payment process, remember that receiving crypto may take a few hours.
The payment has been completed. Remember: The payment has been completed. Remember that receiving crypto may take a few hours.
The transacation was declined, due to pa: The transacation was declined, due to payment method issues.
Crypto purchased for user but is in Sard: Crypto purchased for user but is in Sardine's custodied wallet. Remember that receiving crypto may take a few hours.
The payment is complete and the crypto h: The payment is complete and the crypto has been delivered to the user's wallet.

Enter your recovery phrase (usually 12-w: 按正确顺序输入恢复短语（通常为 12 个字词）。只用一个空格分隔每个字词（没有逗号或任何其他标点符号）。对于非英语语言的备份短语：某些字词可能包含特殊符号，因此请确保正确拼写所有字词。

The file could not be shared: The file could not be shared
Would you like to backup your wallet?: Would you like to backup your wallet?
If you delete the BitPay app or lose you: If you delete the BitPay app or lose your device, you’ll need your recovery phrase regain acess to your funds.
Because your encrypted password is not s: 由于 BitPay 不存储加密密码，无法将其重置。
If you need to regain access to your wal: 如果您由于忘记或丢失了加密密码，需要重新获得钱包的存取权限，必须使用 12 字恢复短语恢复该钱包。
If you do not have the recovery phrase,: 如果没有恢复短语，您将无法重新获得钱包的存取权限
Share this invitation with the devices j: 与加入此账户的设备分享此邀请。每位共同付款人都有自己的恢复短语。要找回存入共享钱包中的资金，您将需要每位共同付款人的恢复短语。

Your encryption password has been set. T: 您的加密密码已设置。此密钥现已加密。

Your wallet will be encrypted. Whenever: 您的钱包将被加密。每当您进行交易时，我们都会要求您输入密码。该密码无法找回，因此请确保安全保管。
Multisig wallets require multisig device: 要使用多重签名钱包，需要安装多重签名设备。这需要更长时间才能完成，但它是长期存储的推荐安全配置。
The single address feature will force th: 单一地址功能将强制钱包仅使用一个地址而不生成新地址。

Are you sure you want to delete all wall: 确定要删除使用此密钥的所有钱包吗？
Your wallet is all that is needed to acc: 您的钱包是存取您的资金所需的全部。请确保保护您的钱包并且仅将其存储在安全的设备上。BitPay 无法访问您的恢复短语，因此您的钱包由您独自负责。如果您与外部服务人员共享钱包访问权限，您将承担被盗或泄露的风险。
You can import this wallet into other de: 您可以通过 BitPay 扫描程序将此钱包导入其他设备。
Your extended private keys are all that: 您的扩展私钥是存取您的资金所需的全部。请确保保护您的私钥并且仅将其存储在安全的设备上。BitPay 无法访问您的私钥，因此您的密钥由您独自负责。如果您与外部服务人员共享密钥访问权限，您将承担被盗或泄露的风险。只有高级用户才能直接处理扩展私钥。
There are no wallets with funds availabl: 没有包含可以使用此功能的资金的钱包。
Your funds, on your device: 您的资金，在您的设备上
A wallet is like a vault stored on your: 钱包就像一个存储在您的设备上的保险库，其中包含您的加密货币资金。像保险库一样，您的钱包只能通过恢复短语进行访问。
Your wallet recovery phrase is composed: 您的钱包恢复短语由 12 个随机选择的字词组成。如果您的设备丢失或损坏，只要您有 12 字恢复短语，即可重新访问您的钱包。
In order to protect your funds from bein: 为了防止黑客和小偷存取您的资金，必须将恢复短语保存在安全的地方，并保密。
Choose another currency you would like t: Choose another currency you would like to add to your key.
Prevent an unauthorized user from sendin: 防止未经授权的用户从您的钱包中发送资金。
View all the ways to manage and configur: 查看管理和配置密钥的所有方式。
To continue please enter your encryption: 要继续，请输入您的加密密码。
This password cannot be recovered. If th: 此密码无法找回。如果此密码丢失，只能通过重新导入 12 字恢复短语来找回资金。
Use more than one device to create a mul: 使用多个设备创建多重签名钱包
Joining another user's multisig wallet r: 加入另一位用户的多重签名钱包时，需要获得邀请才能加入

Your recovery key is composed of 12 rand: 您的恢复密钥由 12 个随机选择的字词组成。请花几分钟时间按每个字词的显示顺序仔细写下它们。
Share this QR code to receive in your wa: 分享此二维码以在您的{{walletName}}钱包中接收 {{amountUnitStr}}。
Due to high demand, miner fees are high. Fees are paid to miners who process transactions and are not paid to BitPay.

BY USING THIS CARD YOU AGREE WITH THE TE: 使用本卡，即表示您同意持卡人协议和费用表（如有）的条款与条件。此卡由 Metropolitan Commercial Bank（FDIC 成员）根据 Mastercard International 的许可发行。“Metropolitan Commercial Bank”和“Metropolitan”是 Metropolitan Commercial Bank 的注册商标 ©2014。
Mastercard is a registered trademark and: Mastercard 是注册商标，圆圈设计是 Mastercard International Incorporated 的商标。
By giving my email address, I give expli: By giving my email address, I give explicit consent to BitPay to use it to contact me about payment issues.

Search contact or enter address: 搜索联系人或输入地址
This transaction amount is too small com: 与当前的比特币网络费相比，此交易金额过小。

Each wallet (except for ETH/ERC20) can g: 每个钱包（ETH/ERC20 除外）可以通过您的 12 字恢复短语生成数十亿个地址。每次您收到付款时，都会自动生成并显示一个新地址。
It's a good idea to avoid reusing addres: 建议您避免重复使用地址 - 这既可以保护您的隐私，又可以避免您的比特币受到量子计算机的假设攻击。

For BTC, LTC, DOGE, BCH, ZenLedger impor: For BTC, LTC, DOGE, BCH, ZenLedger import is limited and may require you to manually upload additional addresses in their dashboard.
After you create a ZenLedger account or: After you create a ZenLedger account or log in with your existing account, BitPay will automatically send your Wallet Addresses to Zenledger to be imported.
ZenLedger makes crypto taxes easy. Log I: ZenLedger makes crypto taxes easy. Log In or Create your ZenLedger Account and BitPay will import your wallets for you.
